website_summaries.verdict: Lots of storage space; great for Apple devices.
pros: Backs up photos and allows you to put them directly on USB
cons: Occasional reports of data overload and crashing

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money !  No tech support !  ( responding one month later is not support).  Poorer quality photos .
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it and regret buying it and spending that amount of money. I could have bought a TB hard drive with the same amount of money. It was soooo slow ! Never did finish downloading. I contacted their tech support. I received a stock reply. I finally received a reply 1 whole month later ! Really ? I learned along the way that the quality of my photos would be less using this Bolt. I downloaded my photos to my computer directly like I always have without the bolt. I would love to get my money back !
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works extremely well and has been life-changing in terms of transfering a year's worth of photos and videos off of my phone. I have always had difficulty locating specific videos because when I connect my iphone to my pc it doesnt show my iphone folders. Just numbered ones. The Bolt also does not "see" the folders but easily lets me search through my files. I transfered about 180 videos to my computer yesterday and can now safely delete them from my phone and free up some much-needed memory!
customer_reviews.author: Code Deb

customer_reviews.title: easy use
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to connect to my iphone 8 and lenovo ideapad last 4 hours but no response. I tried to connect Kingston chat but they said "today full try tomorrow". Web site support says "try to change driver name but there is no option to change driver name. I will try more 2 hours then I will send back this product.
customer_reviews.author: Serdar Caglayan

customer_reviews.title: A really good product. Small but able to store all my ...
customer_reviews.text: A really good product. Small but able to store all my photos. At last I can organise things properly and make some space on my Ipad and iphone. It is especially easy to transfer photos from Ipad/iphone to microsoft computer as bolt has a USB connection at one end and an Apple connection at the other, so you can transfer or store photos either way.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: ... save your money 4/9/2018 thought it would be a great buy terrible if you want to save video terrible
customer_reviews.text: Donot buy please save your money 4/9/2018 thought it would be a great buy terrible if you want to save video terrible
customer_reviews.author: Rashad Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Worthless. Do Not Buy. My return is not being accepted
customer_reviews.text: bought this to offload photos off my iPhone. Did not work for me. Allowed it to be plugged in a 'transfer' photos for over 8 hrs. and nothing was transferred, no progress was recorded. Seemed hung up in the 'preparing to transfer'. I attempted this at different times over the course of a few days. Same zero result. I'd look for other options.
customer_reviews.author: brad t rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but it doesn’t work. Plenty of space available and won’t even transfer 10 photos in 20 min. Slow useless junk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed due to slowness in copying
customer_reviews.text: Very, very slow in copying photos from my iphone 7 to the bolt device. I expected it to work faster because this seems to be exclusively made for iphones. oh and i have to manually select those photos from iphone to copy into bolt. I am not sure if this is normal, it took over 45 mins to copy 24 GB of photos. And i have over 4,000 pics and videos on my iphone and it is a very tedious process selecting them manually. may be i had higher expectations from the device.
customer_reviews.author: Lek

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product, pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I am horrible about keeping photos on my phone. We are talking 3,000 or so. I don’t know how to get my photos off of my phone onto the computer either. So now I don’t have to! It couldn’t be easier to use. Works just like a flash drive. I didn’t even need help. And, I am not a techy. Loved it so much, I bought one for my best friend for Christmas. She loves it too! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen O

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: How many things have you bought for your phone or PC that required repeated attempts to install them and get them to do what the were purported to do? If you are like me, this happens all too often. The Kingston Bolt did exactly what it said it was supposed to do. I plugged it in, installed the app quickly and then transferred photos to the device. My computer recognized it and moved the photos perfectly. Quick, easy and painless. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: K&R in SD

customer_reviews.title: So Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing. I film short how-to videos at work using my iPhone, and this thumb drive is fantastic for that. I can easily transfer the film clips quickly from my phone to my laptop and start organizing and editing the footage. The transfer is quick, and the app is easy to use. I've had it for several months now and used it a lot, and haven't had any problems with it. I haven't even reached half the storage capacity! And I love love love the little carrying case. I put a large keychain on it so that I don't misplace the drive in its case. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: von Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Does not work / App freezes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this on my iPhone 6. It doesn’t work. The app will lock up when transferring pictures from phone to the Bolt. I have removed and installed the app three times, but it still hangs. But, when taking pictures directly to the Bolt it works. Go figure. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: blueskye

customer_reviews.title: Big mess! Pics are scattered-no longer chronological.
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy this based on reviews, but when it went on sale before Christmas, I thought I’d give it a try & quickly free up some space from my almost full iPhone. It’s sturdy and I had no trouble downloading photos, but the huge disappointment is that none of the pictures are in any type of order anymore. What a mess! That would’ve been a deal breaker for me had I known this. I can no longer return, so I’m out the $35. If you don’t care about that, then I’d say with the sale, it’s a decent deal.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Break my files
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first time it breaks my file. Noticed the app turned off by itself during the transfer of a sudden, tried to reopen the app, it only shown"Please connect the drive". Unplug the drive and connect again in which the drive resume to transfer again, however, the task CANNOT BE DONE. And the worse thing is the file failed to transfer will be broken, cannot even find it in the folder when connecting directly to the PC. Every single transfer like gambling.
customer_reviews.author: wellee

customer_reviews.title: Worked when many other devices did not. I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have had 5600 pictures stuck on my iPhone 7Plus for about 6 months. I have tried many devices as well as the standard way of removing the pictures. Until today I have never had any luck. This device not only was able to save all my pictures but it also deleted them from my phone. I am very impressed with how easy it was to use and how well it worked. I think it took just under 2 hours to get all my pictures off and then erased from the phone. Thanks many times over
customer_reviews.author: augustine  penta

customer_reviews.title: Bad Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Plugged this into my iPad and it was very difficult to get it to register that it was connected. Once it finally did, it said it transferred all of the photos but they were not in the same order at all. Made the mistake of unplugging it and tried to plug it back it but I couldn’t ever get it to register that it was connected. Just going to use google photos as a backup instead.
customer_reviews.author: Lala K

customer_reviews.title: Bummed about this actually!
customer_reviews.text: I super wanted to use this but it was so hard to set up, so I put it on my keychain to get some help from a friend, and it totally fell off...sad day! I am hoping it will show up!🤔 not sure how it fell out. Also, wanted to move photos and videos from my phone but couldn’t tell whether they were going to be there for sure if I selected delete after. (Needed more instructions on how to know if the process was completed correctly).
customer_reviews.author: G.M.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My storage space for photos was full. I did not want to delete them, and there was no easy way to move that many photos, I only took about 2 minutes to down load the app and copy them. Then load them on to my computer. I had to down load one of the free photo programs on line to view then=m at full screen size on m computer. Then I deleted the ones on my phone to have room to take new photos.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: It does work well but its not like a flash card.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and very small. I think it may be a limitation of the IOS device but you can only use it for video and photos. I was hoping to have it work more like a flashcard which acts more like a mini hard drive that you can put anything on it. Hope that changes in the future. No issues so far on the function.
customer_reviews.author: WPB

customer_reviews.title: VERY easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used to just leave my media on my computer, but twice now since having Windows 10, my media has disappeared. I was looking for a cheap alternative to store my media and still have easy access to it and the Kingston Bolt fit the bill perfectly. It can be set up to automatically save pics, or you can do it manually. Accessing pics on the Bolt is easily done from a smart phone, laptop or PC. For simple storage it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Satilite73

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone 6 I plugged it in and downloaded the app as the instructions stated. Chose to select individual photos but it would only except 30 photos no more no matter what I did I should’ve listen to all the bad reviews I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johansson

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: very nice looking, easy to use, but keeps braking after 1st use. I had refunded 1st that was not recognised by my phone after 1st use, received another one... same thing, copied files from phone to my pc once and that's all I was able to do... my phone doesn't see flash drive anymore...
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra

customer_reviews.title: Apple Approved Thumb Drive Works Well
customer_reviews.text: What attracted me to this unit was the fact that its Apple approved for IOS. The app that works with it is easy as advertised. Very easy. Very clean function. Unloaded all my photos & cleaned up my phone. KEY POINT: It only received PHOTOS. You can't download notes, reminders, voice reminders, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Always Careful

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was deciding between this Kingston drive and the SanDisk version and decided to go with this one since it was a gift for a technology challenged person. It was very easy to use and worked perfectly. I read reviews of it not working so I did photos of least importance first and had no problems so I moved them all and it worked fast and did not make copies of photos I moved already. After that I put a copy of the pictures and videos on the computer and a flash drive just so none get lost forever!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kussro

customer_reviews.title: Frees up you phone storage!
customer_reviews.text: Yup, 5 stars! I am super pleased with this product! Holds alllll my photos and videos so I can free up my phone storage space! I’ll always be ready to take a photo and not have to worry about having no space!
customer_reviews.author: Donna G

customer_reviews.title: Be sure your I Phone battery is in A - 1 shape
customer_reviews.text: This device was purchased to remove contents from my I Phone and make more storage possible, on it. Pros: The device and its App were easy to set up and it works as advertised. Cons: Device take a long time to display the items that are stored on it, back on your phone and it consumes a lot of power from your phone to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Nice but
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars if I could view all files and folder tree on the app. The drive is slick and stylish. The holder is cool looking but loose and doesn’t keep it in resulting in me loosing it :( that’s stopping me from buying a new one
customer_reviews.author: Woodels

customer_reviews.title: I should have listened to the bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: Even with customer support I ended up getting 4 photos transferred. It kept telling me that there were no more photos on my phone- there was 1630. I tried automatic and manual, and I uninstalled and installed the app again. I am pretty computer savvy, so I give up. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! LISTEN!
customer_reviews.author: HEIDI SCHMIDT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tool for iPhone users. I got my in-laws these for Christmas and they easily setup the app and transferred pictures right away. The app works great and gives them enough flexibility to get the pictures off their phone to free up space.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Tired of loosing pics.
customer_reviews.text: I’m tired of loosing all my pics when the cell or iPad die. This thing seems to be the answer. Worked immediately.I verified it did copy the pics and vids. Put it in a safe place.
customer_reviews.author: John N

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE!
customer_reviews.text: I'd say I'm more tech savvy than the average person, and before I got this, I bought two other kinds of flash drives that were totally non-intuitive, and frustrating to try and figure out. This one is SIMPLE! Plug & play! So I bought one for my sister, too!
customer_reviews.author: JTD

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions found online and the thing spins and spins and doesn’t actually transfer anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This so easy to use! It’s amazing & holds a lot of pictures & videos. I freed up a lot of space on my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jly59

customer_reviews.title: Still working out the kinks
customer_reviews.text: Works well to capture photos, but transferring photos is not working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K Boyles

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but.......
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but, when you load your photos onto the “Bolt”, the order of the pictures get scrambled. There is no option to create named folders to put you photos into for organization purposes. BIN
customer_reviews.author: Bernard N.

customer_reviews.title: Kingston Bolt does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what was advertised and what I wanted. Easily moved all my iPhone pix from my phone to my terabyte drive for safe keeping. Happy with the options it provides ( erase the phone or leave them, save and remove only selected pix. Uses an app for control.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A Vemmer

customer_reviews.title: Product review
customer_reviews.text: There is no option on this device organization upload your photos or videos and upload my order they get all scrambled
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nava

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I got myself and my husband one for Christmas in 2018 since we take a lot of pictures of our granddaughter and I have to say it’s great since now I can free up the storage in my cell. I would highly recommend this to anyone that takes a lot of pictures.
customer_reviews.author: EVELYN SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for on the go.. Great product and a huge time saver.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Who needs "the cloud" when you have this for backup!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be any easier to use with an iPhone. Nice to be able to back up photos, without a concern for having an internet/data connection. We bought a second one, so we each have our own!
customer_reviews.author: JB the blonde

customer_reviews.title: Only was able to use one time!
customer_reviews.text: I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT; I was only able to use one time .... after that I could never get my phone or ipad to even recognize that the drive was plugged in to it. I tried everything suggested with deleting the app and redoing and it made no difference. Even tried on a different phone .... was a waste of $45
customer_reviews.author: Selene F Amberson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product that makes life so easy and holds so much! It’s fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good file transfer purpose for me
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use on my apple phone. Made it easy to transfer pictures and files I was afraid to loose.
customer_reviews.author: Rb

customer_reviews.title: Bad Investment
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get mine to work and the support resource never responded to my requests for assistance. Read about this in the WSJ in an article about good Christmas gifts. Unfortunately gave two as gifts before trying it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Simp59

customer_reviews.title: Download
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lengthy time to download. But it works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hasenclever

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered used like new . It’s easy to use and so far works great .
customer_reviews.author: Amaze

customer_reviews.title: Stuck on file transfer
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t want to download from my iPhone 5s. Kept transferring files to no end. Returned

customer_reviews.title: Buy something that actually works.
customer_reviews.text: This does not work. Half my pics did not download?????
customer_reviews.author: KRISTIE SPOR

customer_reviews.title: best one yet
customer_reviews.text: I like this i saw a review on youtube and figured I would buy one. it does just what I want it to do great product

customer_reviews.title: Downloaded as expected, but still trying to figure out ...
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded as expected, but still trying to figure out how to use it with photos on it. Not much for directions on use.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Seriously PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. Download pictures and videos easily and delete from your device at the same time. Then transfer them to your NAS, or other hard drive for storage.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy operation of downloading pics and videos from our iPhones, and uploading to computers.

customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how easy it was to download my pictures from my phone to the Kingston Bolt USB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, got all pictures backed up and put on laptop.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen some bad reviews for this product-I’m not sure why??? My photos transferred to it with no problems-that’s what it’s supposed to do. So far I would say this is a great product 👍🏻

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Would not transfer all of my videos & photos from my iPhone

customer_reviews.title: Don't use this
customer_reviews.text: I lost all my videos. But it save all my photos

customer_reviews.title: Horrible omg don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Get this if you want your photos corrupted and originals deleted off your phone. This product is a NIGHTMARE.

customer_reviews.text: However returned 9 of the 12 Have not seen a credit for these

customer_reviews.text: Does not work-just spins and says updating,and the 2nd one does the same so I want a return for both

customer_reviews.title: SLOW!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to move pictures and videos from my memory challenged iPad. Two hours to move ten pictures. Going to send it back, just not practical.

customer_reviews.title: iPhone back up for contacts and photos
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Worked as advertised... The device is physically small

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: great article, feels solid and worked very well on the few occasions I used it so far

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works so well that I bought ten and gave them as Christmas gifts.

customer_reviews.title: BEST MEMORY STICK !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST MEMORY STICK ON THE MARKET FOR APPLE DEVICES !!!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: ... download the app to your computer and it is easy to use after that
customer_reviews.text: You download the app to your computer and it is easy to use after that. Every options you need to use are on that application.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too cool way to transfer photos and videos without taking up space on my phone.

product_meta.title: Kingston Bolt USB 3.0 Flash drive Memory Stick for Apple iPhone & iPads with iOS 9.0+, External Expandable Memory Storage, DataTraveler Bolt Duo, Take more photos & videos, 128GB – Silver
product_meta.description:
Style:128GB

Live the moment - Don’t let running out of storage keep you from capturing that perfect moment. The Kingston Bolt features a Lightning connector on one end and a Type A USB on the other end. This allows for the easy transfer or photos and videos from your Apple device.
iPhone and iPad Compatible - The Bolt is an easy way to extend storage space to your iPhone or iPad. Some think of it as an iPhone Flash Drive, iPhone Storage, or iPhone Memory expansion.
Apple MFi Certified - Guaranteed to work with all Apple devices with iOS 9.0+ and Lightning Connector including iPhone X / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / 5s / 5c / 5 / iPad Pro / iPad Air / iPad mini / iPod touch
Easy to use - Simply plug it in, and download the Bolt app from the App Store**, and then back up your camera roll. The Bolt will make storing your iPhone or iPad photos and videos stress-free. With the Bolt you can take photos and videos directly to the device instead of using your iPhone or iPad storage. The camera feature can record video in 720p, 1080p, or 4K. Pictures are saved directly to the device when plugged in and the app is used. The camera feature of the Bolt app is so similar to the existing iPhone and iPad you won’t feel the need to learn how to use a whole new feature.
Secure – The Kingston Bolt also features an app security feature. This allows a user to set a password or touch ID in order to access the app with their Bolt, protecting against unauthorized use on their iPhone or iPad.
Portable – The Bolt makes extra storage for iPhone or iPad accessible at any time with the included key ring accessory. Many people find that iPhone and iPad storage are difficult to transport. The key ring accessory that is included with the Kingston Bolt can easily be attached to your car keys so it is always with you. 
Sleek Design – The Bolt is a very small form factor unlike many of our competitors. You would be hard pressed to find a similar iPhone Flash or USB storage device that is smaller than the Bolt. The durable metal casing ensures long-lasting performance under tough conditions. There are no clunky caps or cases to deal with.
More Storage – Nothing is more frustrating than trying to take a picture or video on your iPhone or iPad and running out of storage. The Bolt comes in 32GB, 64GB, and 128GB capacity. With the Kingston Bolt you are instantly upgrading your iPhone or iPad Storage capacity and giving you extra room to take more photos and videos with your Apple device. 
Warranty and Support – The Bolt comes with a 2 year warranty and backed by Kingston’s renowned technical support. This gives you peace of mind when using the Bolt with your iPhone or iPad.
Disclaimer – Apple, iPad, iPhone, and Lightning are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries
feature_bullets: Portable – Small form factor and included rubber key ring accessory means it’s easy to take with you and can be used with your iPhone or iPad at any time.

Apple MFi Certified: Guaranteed to work with all Apple devices with Lightning Connector including iPhone X / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 6s / 6s Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / 5s / 5c / 5 / iPad Pro / iPad Air / iPad mini / iPod touch
Free up iPhone or iPad Storage Space Automatically back up your Camera roll
Familiar interface Snap hi res photos & 720p, 1080p, or 4k videos directly to the Bolt. The Bolt camera looks and interacts just like your iPhone or iPad camera.
Simple app design The Bolt is just easy to use, simply plug in and download the app to get started.
Extra Capacity 32GB/64GB/128GB flash drive for iPhone and iPad. Gives you a storage upgrade without having to upgrade your iPhone or iPad
Warranty and Support The Bolt comes with a 2 year warranty and Free Kingston technical support. This gives you peace of mind when using the Bolt with your iPhone or iPad.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars204 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: 4. Bolt app screen, 5. Bolt Packaging, 2. Bolt with accessory on keychain, 1. Bolt by itself, 3. Bolt plugged into iPhone
